description:

Welcome to another episode of "Old Money Meets New Ideas," where today we're diving headfirst into the anti-hustle culture, thanks to none other than Sophia Money-Coutts. Is the traditional grind really superior, or is Gen-Z just smarter about work? Spoiler alert: spending your day in a bank that sounds like it's straight out of a Charles Dickens novel doesn’t necessarily mean you’re winning at life. Join us a
title: Gen-Z and The Rise of "Anti-Hustle" (Sophia Money-Coutts)
